edu.nd.darts.cimon
Interface AdminObservable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminObserver, SensorObserver, SystemObserver, UserObserver
public interface AdminObservable

Interface for custom observer framework used to provide updates to CIMON administration app.

Author:
chris miller

Method Summary
 long getMinInterval()
          Returns minimum interval for registered observer.
 boolean hasObserver()
          Check if active observer exists for current category.
 void notifyChange(int groupId)
          Notify administration app (observer) of updates to values for metric group.
 void registerObservable(ObservableUpdate observUpdate, int groupId)
          Register an observable to be notified when a new observer is present.
 void registerObserver(AdminUpdate adminUpdate, Handler handler, long minInterval)
          Register an observer to receive updates from observables.
 void unregisterObservable(int groupId)
          Unregister observable if no longer active and providing updates.
 void unregisterObserver(AdminUpdate adminUpdate)
          Unregister observer to stop receiving updates.
 

Method Detail

hasObserver

boolean hasObserver()
Check if active observer exists for current category.

Returns:
true if a valid observer is currently registered with this observable

getMinInterval

long getMinInterval()
Returns minimum interval for registered observer. Used to throttle updates to the observer.

Returns:
throttle period for observer, in milliseconds

registerObserver

void registerObserver(AdminUpdate adminUpdate,
                      Handler handler,
                      long minInterval)
Register an observer to receive updates from observables. The observer will be a listview within the administration app.

Parameters:
adminUpdate - observer registering to receive updates
handler - updates will be posted to this handler, should be handler for listview UI thread
minInterval - minimum interval to throttle updates, in milliseconds

unregisterObserver

void unregisterObserver(AdminUpdate adminUpdate)
Unregister observer to stop receiving updates. This should be called in onPause of observer, to avoid performing updates on listview which is not visible.

Parameters:
adminUpdate - observer to unregister from observable

registerObservable

void registerObservable(ObservableUpdate observUpdate,
                        int groupId)
Register an observable to be notified when a new observer is present.

Parameters:
observUpdate - observable that will be providing updates
groupId - id for metric group (category) as specified in Metrics

unregisterObservable

void unregisterObservable(int groupId)
Unregister observable if no longer active and providing updates.

Parameters:
groupId - id for metric group (category) as specified in Metrics

notifyChange

void notifyChange(int groupId)
Notify administration app (observer) of updates to values for metric group.

Parameters:
groupId - id of metric group that has been updated
